bibl.title: Bookrolls and Scribes in Oxyrhynchus. (Studies in Book and Print Culture.)
bibl.note: tabl., 1 fig. et 18 pll. coul. dont 3 dépl.

1. Introduction. - 2. Scribes in Oxyrhynchus: Scribal Habits, Paradosis, and the Uniformity of the Literary Roll [Scribes #A1-#A33, #B1-#B6]. - 3. Formal Characteristics of the Bookroll. - Pp. 231-249: Appendix 1. Papyri Included in the Sample; - 251-336: Appendix 2. Addenda and Corrigenda to Editions in the Sample Sets; - 337-339: Appendix 3. Resolution of Ambiguous Reconstructions. - Glossary. Bibliography. Index.
